a8c0ded0-09b5-4c49-ac80-48e374f65a98.title: Grilled Chicken Salad
a8c0ded0-09b5-4c49-ac80-48e374f65a98.description: A classic Greek salad made with grilled chicken and fresh vegetables.
instructions: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Brush chicken breasts with olive oil, season with salt and pepper.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side or until fully cooked.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice into thin strips.
In a large bowl, combine salad greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, red onion, and feta cheese.
Top the salad with grilled chicken strips.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.

8f2d1c87-8e98-4150-82c2-c4db9133ac02.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
8f2d1c87-8e98-4150-82c2-c4db9133ac02.description: A classic Italian dish made with ground beef, onions, garlic, and tomato sauce.
instructions: In a large skillet, brown the ground beef over medium heat.
Add diced onions and minced garlic, cook until onions are soft.
Stir in crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper.
Pour in red wine and let simmer for 20-30 minutes.
Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Serve Bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti, garnish with Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

c8a1979f-92ba-4a25-9d0b-8be129c51721.title: Avocado Toast
c8a1979f-92ba-4a25-9d0b-8be129c51721.description: A simple yet delicious breakfast toast made with mashed avocado on toasted bread.
ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, sesame seeds
instructions: In a bowl, mash the avocados with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado onto toasted bread slices.
Top with desired toppings like cherry tomatoes, red pepper flakes, or sesame seeds.

11abdef3-6272-4cf0-8723-acc187438b92.title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
11abdef3-6272-4cf0-8723-acc187438b92.description: A nourishing vegan bowl filled with grains, vegetables, and a flavorful dressing.
ingredients: 1 cup cooked quinoa or brown rice
2 cups mixed vegetables (e.g., broccoli, carrots, bell peppers)
instructions: Divide cooked quinoa or brown rice into bowls.
Arrange chickpeas, mixed vegetables, and sliced avocado on top.
In a small bowl, whisk together hummus, tahini, lemon juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
Drizzle the dressing over the bowl before serving.

eb727d21-284a-47ff-a374-3bb36375bd21.title: Mango Chicken Curry
eb727d21-284a-47ff-a374-3bb36375bd21.description: A flavorful curry made with tender chicken, ripe mangoes, and aromatic spices.
ingredients: 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into cubes
instructions: In a skillet, saut√© onions and garlic until fragrant.
Add chicken cubes and cook until browned.
Stir in curry powder, turmeric, and cumin.
Add diced mangoes and coconut milk, let simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
